Name: Standing Statue of Padi Hor
Description: This statue of the priest Padi Hor represents him standing on a low base with his left leg forward.As was common for priests, Padi Hor is shown closely shaven and wearing a long garment bearing the figure of Osiris on the front. The latter is depicted wearing his Atef crown and holding the Heqa scepter and the flail, crossed on his chest. The sculptor has successfully modeled the facial features and chest muscles of the priest.
